verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu uniumbie moyo safi,
uifanye upya roho iliyotulia
ndani mwangu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Unirehemu sawa
sawa na fadhili,
kiasi cha wingi wa rehema
zako yafute makosa.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Unioshe kabisa
na uovu wangu,
ukanitakase dhambi zangu
zote kwa rehema zako.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu
uniumbie moyo safi,
uifanye upya roho iliyotulia
ndani mwangu.
